mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, is_top, title, writer, writer_user_id, content, views, created_at, updated_at, deleted_yn, deleted_at FROM notice WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY is_top DESC, notice_id ASC

SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, is_top AS isTop, title AS title, content AS content, views AS views, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, deleted_yn AS deleteYn, deleted_at AS deletedAt FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, title AS title FROM notice WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' AND notice_id < #{noticeId} ORDER BY notice_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, title AS title FROM notice WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' AND notice_id > #{noticeId} ORDER BY notice_id ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (is_top, title, content, views, created_at, updated_at, deleted_yn, deleted_at) VALUES (#{isTop}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), 'N', NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET views = views + 1 WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
UPDATE notice SET deleted_yn = 'Y', deleted_at = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
